episodes.title: Understanding Yoga Research & Biomechanics
episodes.description: No doubt there’s a lot of pseudoscience in the yoga world, but it can be challenging for even the most well-intentioned and skeptical among us to understand yoga research and how science and — yes, even math — apply to yoga practice. Thank Isaac Newton's ghost for Jules Mitchell, author of “Yoga Biomechanics” who stopped by the dark side to explain it to us layfolk in the most fun and user-friendly way possible. Jules' website, teacher training, mentorship: https://www.julesmitchell.com/ Jules' book: https://a.co/d/fFfoqjV Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/darksideofthemat Follow us on social media: @darksideofthematpod on Instagram @matdarkside on Twitter and http://facebook.com/darksideofthematpod Send us a tip to: darksideofthematpod@gmail.com Buy Justine’s books: https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/724011/the-grieving-therapist-by-larisa-a-garski-lmft/ https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/659309/starship-therapise-by-larisa-garski/ Buy Kat’s books: https://www.amazon.com/Yoga-Inversions-Guide-Going-Upside/dp/1645471004 https://www.amazon.com/Yoga-Where-You-Are-Customize/dp/1611807867 Artwork by Ali Ford: https://linktr.ee/wickedencounters

episodes.title: Does Everyone NEED Yoga?
episodes.description: Justine, Kat, producer Kyle, and special guest Nam Chanterrwyn discuss the notion everyone needs yoga to be complete and explore possible dark cultural underpinnings behind that idea (umm... actual nazis just entered the chat?) Nam's website, classes, retreats, & teacher trainings https://www.yoganam.yoga Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/darksideofthemat Follow us on social media: @darksideofthematpod on Instagram @matdarkside on Twitter and http://facebook.com/darksideofthematpod Send us a tip to: darksideofthematpod@gmail.com Buy Justine’s books: https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/724011/the-grieving-therapist-by-larisa-a-garski-lmft/ https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/659309/starship-therapise-by-larisa-garski/ Buy Kat’s books: https://www.amazon.com/Yoga-Inversions-Guide-Going-Upside/dp/1645471004 https://www.amazon.com/Yoga-Where-You-Are-Customize/dp/1611807867 Artwork by Alexsandra Ford: https://linktr.ee/wickedencounters

episodes.title: Operation "F That Guy"
episodes.description: Bikram is coming to Canada…or is he? In this very special episode Colin Hall tells Justine and Producer Kyle about his efforts to thwart Bikram’s plans in operation “F that guy.” Tune in and then join in the fight! Here are some steps you can take to help stop Bikram Choudhury. Sign the petition @changedotorg , https://www.change.org/p/stop-predator-bikram-choudhury-from-hosting-yoga-seminar-at-the-parq-marriott-vancouver Write an email to the Mayor of Vancouver, Ken Sim, @kensimcity , ken.sim@vancouver.ca Contact CBC News Vancouver, @cbcnews , cbcnewsvancouver@cbc.ca , 604-662-6801 Write an email to the Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship, @seanfrasermp , sean.fraser@parl.gc.ca Contact Canada Border Services Agency, @canborder , 1-888-502-9060 Write an email to the event organizers, Canada Yoga Sports Federation, @canada_yoga info@canadayoga.com Share this and other articles, information and resources about Bikram Choudhury. Resources on Bikram Choudhury: Dr. Ramani Durvasula, @doctorramani , Navigating Narcissim Podcast: Bikram Yoga and the Abuse of Power w/ Mandeep Kaur Sandhu. Netflix Documentary, Bikram: Yogi, Guru, Predator. Daily Hive Articles: @dailyhivevancouver Yoga Journal Articles: @yogajournal Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/darksideofthemat Follow us on social media: @darksideofthematpod on Instagram @matdarkside on Twitter and http://facebook.com/darksideofthematpod Send us a tip to: darksideofthematpod@gmail.com Buy Justine’s books: https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/724011/the-grieving-therapist-by-larisa-a-garski-lmft/ https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/659309/starship-therapise-by-larisa-garski/ Buy Kat’s books: https://www.amazon.com/Yoga-Inversions-Guide-Going-Upside/dp/1645471004/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=kat+heagberg&qid=1675131847&sprefix=kat+heag%2Caps%2C156&sr=8-1 https://www.amazon.com/Yoga-Where-You-Are-Customize/dp/1611807867/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=yoga+where+you+are&qid=1639698472&sr=8-1 https://www.amazon.com/Embodied-Resilience-through-Yoga-Empowerment/dp/0738762490/ref=sr_1_1?crid=3BQWMQTQTIDUF&keywords=embodied+resilience+through+yoga&qid=1639698620&sprefix=embodied+res%2Caps%2C229&sr=8-1 WHAT IS DARK SIDE OF THE MAT? Always insightful, sometimes sarcastic, never shaming. Hosts Kat and Justine spill the tea on all the creeps, cults, and crime in the yoga world.

episodes.title: Better Late Than Never
episodes.description: Guess who’s back, back again? Dark Side’s back, tell a friend! After a lengthy hiatus, Dark Side of the Mat is back. In this Season 2 intro, producer Kyle asks Justine and Kat for their insights about spiritual abuse, and somehow learns about Justine’s lost dream of owning a pony. episodes.title: Create-a-Cult With Justine and Kat! (Season 1 Finale/Q&A)
episodes.description: In this Season 1 wrap-up (don't worry, we'll be back for season 2!) Justine and Kat answer your questions about yoga creeps, cults, and crimes and more — your queries ranged from serious to silly, and you even got us creating our own cults at the end. You won't want to miss this one, friends. episodes.title: Holy Yoga, Batman! (Christian Yoga and “Yoga Alternatives”)
episodes.description: Lord of the fishes, have mercy! Kat, Justine, and special guest/hilarious Christianity expert Jenni Stukin delve into the world of Christian yoga and “yoga alternatives,” including Holy Yoga, Yaweh Yoga (apologies to our Jewish ancestors), the most popular Christian yoga on YouTube, and yes . . . even Praisemoves. Tune in to hear our thoughts and discoveries, and if we found anything creepy, culty, or crimey along the way. Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/darksideofthemat Follow us on social media: @darksideofthematpod on Instagram @matdarkside on Twitter and http://facebook.com/darksideofthematpod Buy Justine’s book: https://www.amazon.com/Starship-Therapise-Therapeutic-Fanfiction-Rewrite Buy Kat’s books: https://www.amazon.com/Embodied-Resilience-through-Yoga-Empowerment/dp/0738762490/ref=sr_1_1?crid=3BQWMQTQTIDUF&keywords=embodied+resilience+through+yoga&qid=1639698620&sprefix=embodied+res%2Caps%2C229&sr=8-1 https://www.amazon.com/Yoga-Where-You-Are-Customize/dp/1611807867/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=yoga+where+you+are&qid=1639698472&sr=8-1 Follow Jenni on Instagram, Twitter, and TikTok @jennistukin And be sure to check out “Hip Hop Pastor”: https://www.instagram.com/p/B5Qkc5zp8yP/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link Sources: Holy Yoga https://holyyoga.net/ Yaweh Yoga https://yahwehyoga.com/ The Yoga Abbey https://www.theyogaabbey.com/ Caroline William’s YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0n6WQ3_PAePXz_IZzXZFGA Praisemoves: https://praisemoves.com/

In our first full-on true crime episode, special guest Colin Hall regales Kat and Justine with the super-disturbing but fascinating story. episodes.title: Trevor Tice & Corepower Yoga: Core Power to Ya!
episodes.description: In this second investigation, Justine info-dumps on Kat about the CorePower Yoga system, and its leader, Trevor Tice. Content warning for death/dying, questionable labor practices, and opulent capitalism. Links: CPY 2014 Press Kit Inc NYT article CBS Yoga Journal Defector Westword Elephant Journal

episodes.title: John Friend & Anusaragate 2012: Drinking the Kula Aid
episodes.description: Kat regales Justine with the tale of John Friend and his many misdeeds and how she herself drank the kula aid back in the early aughts. Yoga Teacher Resource Podcast episode where Kat and Dianne Bondy share their Anusara stories: https://yogateacherresource.libsyn.com/yoga-where-you-are Sources: Scandal contorts future of John Friend, Anusara yoga https://www.washingtonpost.com/lifestyle/style/scandal-contorts-future-of-john-friend-anusara-yoga/2012/03/28/gIQAeLVThS_story.html https://www.anusarayoga.com/ JOHN FRIEND: THE MAN WHO WOULD BE YOGA KING https://www.independent.co.uk/life-style/health-and-families/features/john-friend-man-who-would-be-yoga-king-2288855.html Karma Crash https://nymag.com/news/features/john-friend-yoga-2012-4/ John Friend: The Man, The Myth, The ‘Yoga Mogul’ https://web.archive.org/web/20120407132823/http://www.yogadork.com/news/john-friend-the-man-the-myth-the-yoga-mogul/ The Yoga Mogul https://web.archive.org/web/20120418165714/http://www.nytimes.com/2010/07/25/magazine/25Yoga-t.html John Friend, Head of Anusara: The Accusations https://web.archive.org/web/20120413091551/http://www.yogadork.com/news/john-friend-head-of-anusara-wiccan-leader-sexual-deviant-pension-withholding-homewrecker-the-accusations/ John Friend Anusara Scandal: Inside the Wiccan ‘Sex’ Coven https://www.thedailybeast.com/john-friend-anusara-scandal-inside-the-wiccan-sex-coven Running Timeline of Anusara Controversy, Updates and Teacher Resignations https://web.archive.org/web/20120321065246/http://www.yogadork.com/news/running-timeline-of-anusara-controversy-updates-and-teacher-resignations/ John Friend’s Wikipedia entry https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Friend_(yogi) Anusara Pension Documents and Timeline Support Claims https://web.archive.org/web/20120406040936/http://www.yogadork.com/news/anusara-pension-documents-and-timeline/ Letter From John Friend to Anusara Yoga Teachers https://web.archive.org/web/20120412023601/http://www.yogadork.com/news/letter-from-john-friend-to-anusara-yoga-teachers/ Second John Friend Letter to Anusara Teachers: Assume Forgiveness, Resume Business As Usual; Letter from Interim Committee Reflects Discord https://web.archive.org/web/20120412015123/http://www.yogadork.com/news/second-john-friend-letter-to-anusara-teachers-assume-forgiveness-resume-business-as-usual Update: More Anusara Teacher Reactions; episodes.title: Welcome to the Dark Side!
episodes.description: Meet your hosts and learn about their experiences with cults and cult-adjacent stuff in the yoga world and beyond . . . plus a taste of tales to come.
